item.description:
By overwelming demand, dinner will be at Borders Cafe, 32 Church Street. If you will be joining us for dinner YOU HAVE TO BE ON TIME. Borders Cafe will not seat us until eveyone is there. Dinner is at 5:15.

I suggest you get your movie ticket before dinner.

If you will be joining us for dinner, please update your RSVPs by writing "dinner" in your RSVP comment box.

Write "no dinner" if you will not be jong us for dinner.

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Directed by Martin Scorsese; starring Robert De Niro, Jodie Foster, Cybill Shepherd, Harvey Keitel, Peter Boyle, Albert Brooks. 

Get hip to this movie by checking out the trailer here.

Movie starts at 7:00. I'll be in the lobby by 6:45.

Dinner is at 5:15. Location TBD. 

If you don't join us for dinner, look for us in the lobby about 6:45.

Please keep your RSVPs up to date so I know who to look for. 

Post movie socializing location TBD.
item.how_to_find_us: Figure out how to get to Harvard Sq. Arrive early. I'll be in the lobby wearing a Harvard hat. I'll have a Meetup sticker on my lepel.
item.name: Taxi Driver (1976)
